encyclopedia.content: 漫画 即日本著名漫画家手冢治虫的《怪医黑杰克》（又译《怪医秦博士》）扑克 又名“二十一点”词典解释[1] blackjack 名词 n. 1. 革制大酒杯 2. 包革金属棍棒 3. 海盗旗 4.闪锌矿 及物动词 vt. 1. 以棒打

means.word_mean: 1. a common scrubby deciduous tree of central and southeastern United States having dark bark and broad 3-lobed (club-shaped) leaves; tends to form dense thickets
2. a piece of metal covered by leather with a flexible handle; used for hitting people
3. a gambling game using cards; the object is to hold cards having a higher count than those dealt to the bank up to but not exceeding 21
1. exert pressure on someone through threats
